title: Data Best Usage and Revenue Report in M2M Self Service Portal
description:
Description
1. Epic Description
Epic (Requirement and Scope) 
This epic focuses on advancing the Extended Universe through enhancements to the M2M Self Service Portal with new comprehensive functionality. M2M Self Service Portal allows users to generate sophisticated reports based on their own needs.  With introducing new Data Best Pool model it is required to have more specific reports.
The current manual process for reporting usage information and revenue per product for Data Best Customers is becoming increasingly inefficient and error-prone due to the growing number of customers. As the customer base expands, the complexity and time required to compile accurate and timely reports significantly increase, impacting the ability to make informed business decisions quickly.
  Acceptance criteria:
Invoice-related information is added into DATA_BEST folder.
Aggregated usage information is available per Product, per Standard offering, per Customer Offering.
Total Usage data is available per product
Aggregated Revenue (OTC, MRC, Charges per Usages) is available per Product, Per Standard offering, Per Customer offering.
  Benefits 
Power users in finance and marketing can directly access relevant data, promoting transparency and independence.
Users can generate their own reports, reducing manual service requests and easing support team workloads, leading to efficiency and cost savings.
Enhanced report generation allows users greater control and informed decision-making.
The portal enables users to create sophisticated reports for deeper insights, driving better decisions.
  Specific Deliverables  
None
  Acceptance Criteria (conditions which must be satisfied for the Epic to be accepted)
Invoice-related information is added into DATA_BEST folder.
Aggregated usage information is available per Product, per Standard offering, per Customer Offering.
Total Usage data is available per product
Aggregated Revenue (OTC, MRC, Charges per Usages) is available per Product, Per Standard offering, Per Customer offering.
Out of Scope
Creation of new reports, system architecture changes. BI Launchpad reports are not affected.
  Dependencies 
The mapping in the source system is clear and accessible, and the changes have been approved by a business side.
2. Technical / Solution Design / Compliance
Technical & Solution Design  
The proposed solution involves modifying existing folders to incorporate additional attributes and relationships, as well as updating the logic within the M2M Self Service Portal for creating necessary internal reports. This aligns with the architectural roadmap by ensuring compatibility with current systems and minimizing disruption. The implementation will utilize existing technologies and frameworks, focusing on improving performance while maintaining data integrity. The mapping in the source system is clear and accessible, ensuring a smooth integration process.
Compliance evaluation
Done.
  3. NFR (if any)
Non functional requirements
No.
  4. SLA(if any)
Service Level Agreements
